The Puppet 
      Master

Saturday, April 14, at 10 p.m. 
      ET/PT
Heather Grossman and her 
      husband John were driving to a leisurely lunch, when another car pulled up 
      alongside them, a gunman took aim, and fired. The shooting left Heather 
      paralyzed from the neck down; her husband was grazed by a 
      bullet.
 
Police soon discovered who 
      pulled the trigger, but who was pulling the strings? 

 
Who was the puppet 
      master?
 
Correspondent Troy 
      Roberts 
      reports for 48 Hours 
      Mystery, this Saturday, April 14, at 10 p.m. 
      ET/PT.
 
Watch Roberts' Reporter's 
      Notebook.
